It covers key works from across the social sciences by seminal thinkers such Edward Said, Albert Hirschman, Martha Nussbaum and Pierre Bourdieu. The course is in three parts. title: Contemporary Social Theory
prerequisite: YCC2121 Modern Social Thought or with the permission of the instructor.
